pr_title: Add caching for sanitized labels in the Prometheus MetricAdapter.

timeline.author: anuraaga

timeline.bodyText: Is prometheus exporter always guaranteed to be scraped by the same thread? I think I'd just stick with ConcurrentHashMap to let this be safe.
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: I don't know the answer, but I'm cool with using ConcurrentHashMap here as a safety precaution.  Thanks for the suggestion.
replies.author: breedx-splk

timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: Sure thing.  We can talk about the pros/cons of each approach sometime, but I'm happy to change it here.
replies.author: breedx-splk
